headline: 7 Investments To Avoid In 2024: The Reckoning
summary: At the beginning of this year, I wrote an article about which stocks to avoid in 2024. Check out how well I did with my predictions versus S&P 500.

headline: 5 Predictions for the Stock Market in 2025 -- and Which Stocks Will Soar the Most If They're Right
summary: Nearly one year ago, I made four predictions about the stock market in 2024.  The Fed indeed cut rates in Q4, but stocks didn't jump as much as I anticipated.  Here are my five predictions for the stock market in 2025 -- and which stocks will soar the most if they're right.

headline: Best Stock to Buy Right Now: Walmart vs. Costco
summary: Which of these resilient retailers is the better investment?

headline: Top Stock Reports for UnitedHealth, Costco & IBM
summary: Today's Research Daily features new research reports on 16 major stocks, including UnitedHealth Group Incorporated (UNH), Costco Wholesale Corporation (COST) and International Business Machines Corporation (IBM), as well as a micro-cap stock Smith-Midland Corporation (SMID).

headline: Did Costco just reset the narrative around DEI?
summary: In contrast to a slew of companies, the warehouse retailer has forcefully rejected an anti-DEI shareholder proposal as bad for business.
